svg.text: Clean HTML, normalize text, extract metadata
Split into overlapping chunks (512 tokens, 10-20% overlap)
Generate embeddings, store in vector database
Bi-encoder for retrieval, cross-encoder for reranking
Chunk overlap: 10-20% prevents boundary info loss
Critical for maintaining semantic continuity between chunks
Metadata filtering before vector search: latency 5x
Pre-filter by source, date, category before ANN search
Citation tracking: map chunks back to source documents
Essential for trust, debugging, and compliance
Streaming response while retrieving improves UX
Start generating as soon as first chunks arrive
90% of agentic RAG projects failed in production in 2024 -- start with naive RAG first
